#3Novices : M&R probes bridge collapse http://ift.tt/1MrDpRV  October 15, 2015 at 01:25PM 

Murray & Roberts has hired independent consul…
"@ewnreporter: #BridgeCollapse The mother of one of the victims says the injuries were Gods will." "God's will"? No man. Batho ba rona!
So sad..Grayston #BridgeCollapse. Travel that road daily .could have been anyone of us...heartfelt condolences to the victims and families
